dimensional-shift.name: Dimensional Shift
dimensional-shift.message: Will do 70% of max health as damage.

delta.name: Delta Attack
delta.message: Position yourself at your designated position.

enrage.name: Fragor Maximus
enrage.message: Defeat Eden or you will die.

gravity.name: Eden's Gravity
gravity.message: Will do 70% of max health as damage.

mana-boost.name: Mana Boost
mana-boost.message: Interrupt both enemies castings of this.

mana-burst.name: Mana Burst
mana-burst.message: Will wipe the raid if Mana Boost was not interrupted.

mana-slice.name: Mana Slice
mana-slice.message: Tanks must aim this enemy away from the raid.

pure-beam.name: Pure Beam
pure-beam.message: Position yourself on the outside of an orb.

raid-beams.name: Activate Beams
raid-beams.message: Position yourself so the telegraph fires away from the raid.

vice-and-virtue-dps.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-dps.message: DPS must position these away from the raid.

vice-and-virtue-dps-prey.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-dps-prey.message: Healers must transfer this debuff to DPS and then heal them.

vice-and-virtue-tank-prey.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-tank-prey.message: Healers must transfer this debuff to Tanks and then heal them.

vice-and-virtue-dps-stack.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-dps-stack.message: Position yourself with your partner to mitigate incoming damage.

vice-and-virtue-tank-stack.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-tank-stack.message: Position yourself infront of your Tanks to mitigate incoming damage.

vice-and-virtue-tank.name: Vice and Virtue
vice-and-virtue-tank.message: Tanks will be hit by linear lasers. Do not stand with them.
